author: USA TODAY, Rebecca Morin, USA TODAY
title: Trump aide Peter Navarro says 'second opinion' needed on Fauci's view of anti-malaria drug
description: Navarro's comments come a day after reports of a heated argument during a White House coronavirus task force meeting on Saturday about the drug.
content:
President Donald Trump said there's "light at the end of the tunnel" as his administration continues to fight the coronavirus outbreak.
USA TODAY
